statements.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE if NOT EXISTS tso_temp (mktid VARCHAR(10), share VARCHAR(10), unit DECIMAL(10,0), price DECIMAL(10,2), yield INT(10), effdate DATE, efftime TIME, edittime DATETIME, sharename VARCHAR(30), defvalue VARCHAR(50), message VARCHAR(50), remarks MEDIUMTEXT, defdatetime DATETIME)

poststatement.sql: INSERT INTO tso SELECT * FROM tso_temp

options.handler: function handler(data,dataset,field,model,context) { console.log('model',model,'data',data,'dataset',dataset); switch(data.field7) { case 'A': data.field8 = 'Anonymous'; break; case 'B': data.field8 = 'Bad Request'; break; case 'C': data.field8 = 'Counter Attack'; break; } }
function handler(data) { if(data.field7=='A') return null; return data.field1 + '-' + data.field3; }

connection.handler: function apihandler(response,data,dataset) { console.log('res',response,'data',data); let rec = response.body[0].resultset.rows.find((row) => row.typeid == data.field11); console.log('record',rec); if(rec) { return rec.nameen; } return data.field12; }

function dbhandler(response,data,dataset) { console.log('res',response,'data',data); let rec = response.rows.find((row) => row.typeid == data.field11); console.log('record',rec); if(rec) { return rec.nameen; } return data.field12; }

connection.query: select * from tconstant where typename='tappstype' and typeid = ?field11

statement.prehandler: function prehandler(dataset,param,model,context) { console.log('param',param,'dataset',dataset); if(Array.isArray(dataset)) { let record = dataset.find(item => item.mktid == 'TSO'); console.log('prehandler: record',record); if(record) return true; } return false; }

prestatement.sql: update tso set defvalue=null where mktid='TSO'

statement.posthandler: function posthandler(dataset,param,model,context) { console.log('param',param,'dataset',dataset); if(Array.isArray(dataset)) { let record = dataset.find(item => item.share == 'BBL'); console.log('posthandler: record',record); if(record) return true; } return false; }

poststatement.sql: update tso set defvalue='POSTING' where mktid='TSO' and share='BBL'

connection.verifier: function verifier(data,dataset,field,model,context) { console.log('verifier: data',data); return data.share == 'BBL' ? { valid: false, value: 'BBL' } : { valid: true, value: data.share } }
